titleStmt.title: The Low-Country common wealth contayninge an exact description of the eight vnited Prouinces. Now made free. Translated out of french by Ed· Grimeston
titleStmt.author: Le Petit, Jean François, 1546-ca. 1615.
Grimeston, Edward.

notesStmt.note: By Jean François Le Petit, whose name appears on A2r.
Running title reads: The Belgicke common-weale.
Reproductions of the originals in the British Library and the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
Appears at reel 842 (British Library copy) and at reel 970 (University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library copy).
